report.title: Verification Template List (Report Grid)
report.description: A list of verification templates appropriate for use in the report_grid prebuilt form.
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM list_verification_templates vt #joins# WHERE vt.website_id = #website_id# #order_by#
report.field_sql: vt.id as id, vt.restrict_to_website_id, vt.restrict_to_external_keys, vt.restrict_to_family_external_keys

param.name: website_id
param.description: Select the website to return data for
